desc: I started this out of personal need because there isn't a full-stack emergency bag for sale. We only use name brand, top of the line products that won't fail when you need them most. No cheap shit or knock offs - Simply the best products in each class with no corners cut. Think of this as the Ferrari of Go-bags.

layout.text: Every Emergency Go Bag Sucks. Until Now.
We make the Ferrari of Emergency bug out bags. This is your go-to kit anytime. Bug spray... Check. Walkie Talkies... Check.... Hemostatic bandages, Dermabond surgical glue, and Tourniquets... Check.
